item.title: How to Transparently Proxy IP Packets With Spoofed Destinations
item.description: I’ve recently worked on a security project which required me to transparently/interceptingly (if that’s a word) proxy IP packets that have had their destination IPs spoofed. By this, I mean that the destination IP in an IP packet is not the IP of the destination which a DNS request would correctly resolve. For example, this could be due to a DNS query being spoofed and sending an IP address of another destination in reply.
